content: Seeing two similar warnings "[Unable to determine whether the provided codes are in the value set http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/us-core-condition-category because the value set or code system is not known to the validator]" and "[Unable to determine whether the provided codes are in the value set http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/us-core-procedure-code because the value set or code system is not known to the validator]" in Dental Data exchange (https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/dental-data-exchange/branches/master/qa.html). Is anybody else seeing these? Could this be related to the US Core profile wrong link (https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/US.20Core.20profile.20link.20wrong)?
no. looks like this is a downstream issue from the bug I just fixed

I'm also getting a similar warning: [Unable to determine whether the provided codes are in the value set http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/us-core-vital-signs because the value set or code system is not known to the validator]
Will check again after next IG pub release...
I had assumed it was because of the US Core issue, but maybe it isn't.

Actually I think it MIGHT be the us core issue - the link from the error is: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/us-core-vital-signs but when I copy and paste that into my browser it resolves to: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU4.0.0/ValueSet-us-core-vital-signs.html
But when you click on the us core link (the first one above) doesn't it re-direct you to 4.0.0?
What do you mean by "I don't get this error"?

Unable to determine whether the provided codes are in the value set http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/us-core-vital-signs because the value set or code system is not known to the validator]

I just run bfdr with the forthcoming IG pbulisher and didn't get that error
Ok, well, that's awesome, will wait for forthcoming IG publisher!

@Grahame Grieve I am still getting: [Unable to determine whether the provided codes are in the value set http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/us-core-vital-signs because the value set or code system is not known to the validator] : http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/vr-common-library/branches/master/qa.html#_scratch_ig-build-temp-7K3AMT_repo_input_resources_observation_observation-mother-height-carmen-teresa-lee-common
Strangely though - that link (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/us-core-vital-signs) is now going to 4 not 4.0.0 for me. But still getting the warning. Maybe something I have to change?
Code System URI 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.114222.4.5.274' is unknown so the code cannot be validated
